title: Snow Angel
description: Dean likes April. April's brother Jay loves Dean. When Dean finds out how Jay feels it raises difficult questions of his sexuality. If he doesn't get his act together quick, he's gonna lose two friends and one true love. Publisher's Note; Snow Angel is a male/male love story. As such, it contains homoerotic sexual content that may be offensive to some readers; mild bondage, dubious consent, male/male sexual practices.
author: Sharon Maria Bidwell
